page.title: 15CUBS
page.content: When I started cubs I was very excited.I had to go for 8 weeks and then had to pay Â£8.42 for a uniform which was a cap,neck tie,woggle jumper and badges.I had to make a promise to do my best,to do my duty to God and to the Queen,to help other people and to keep the cub scout law.Each week we attended cubs and worked to earn badges.For my first badge I had to plant 7 daffodils,4 sweet peas and 6 cabbages.Each week we had an inspection to see who was the tidiest.I earned an artists badge as well.I had to draw lots of pictures.I worked on getting my bronze badge.You can get a bronze,silver and gold badge.I had to do a lot of tests then I got my bronze badge.I was very pleased.
